description: For a long-sleeved tee that works with you as you get moving, look no further than this men’s Merino Sport 150 tee. Its blend of ZQ-certified Merino wool and polyester helps with thermoregulation, odor control, dry times, and durability, so you can keep up the intensity for as long as you want. Plus, its thoughtful construction includes anti-chafing and offset seams, so your skin will thank you too.
name: Smartwool Merino (150) Logo LS Graphic Tee - Mens
